content: s the training position ('Trainer' or 'Trainee') if the flight is a training flight; otherwise, null. | | trainingCode | `'string'` | Code representing the training associated with the flight. | | status | `'string'` | Status of the activity. The status is "ACTIVE" for flights assigned to the crew and "CANCELLED" for removed flights. | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Ground Activity Data Model | Attribute | Type | Description | | :---------------- | :--------: | :------------------------------------------------- | | rosterId | `'string'` | Published roster id of the crew including this ground activity | | tripId | `'string'` | Trip id of the crew including this ground activity | | dutyId | `'string'` | Duty id of the crew including this ground activity | | crewId | `'string'` | Company employee number | | code | `'string'` | Ground activity code | | codeDescription | `'string'` | Ground activity code description | | station | `'string'` | Airport of the ground activity if possible | | startDate | `'datetime'` | Start date and time of the ground activity in UTC | | endDate | `'datetime'` | End date and time of the ground activity in UTC | | position | `'string'` | Position of the crew | | trainingCrewAssignmentId | `'string'` | Identifier of the crew assignment associated with the training, if applicable; otherwise, null. | | trainingId | `'string'` | Unique identifier for the training session. | | trainingCode | `'string'` | Code representing the type or category of the training activity. | | instructorName | `'string'` | Full name of the training instructor. | | trainingRole | `'string'` | Role of the crew in the training. | | trainingVenue | `'string'` | Venue where the training takes place. | | status | `'string'` | Status of the ground activity. The status is "ACTIVE" for ground activities assigned to the crew and "CANCELLED" for removed ground activities. | | extraInfo | `'string'` | Extra information | # Crew Flight Transport Data Model |
